  • SEARCH: 
 

Uses of Package
io.j4c.config.spi

  • Packages that use io.j4c.config.spi 
    Package Description
    io.j4c.config
    Immutable tree-like Configuration API that can be enhanced by custom SPI implementations.
    io.j4c.config.etcd
    Etcd configuration source.
    io.j4c.config.git
    Git configuration source.
    io.j4c.config.hocon
    HOCON format ConfigParser implementation using Typesafe (Lightbend) Config library.
    io.j4c.config.spi
    Configuration SPI that allows to enhance Config functionality.
    io.j4c.config.yaml
    YAML format ConfigParser implementation.
    io.j4c.security.tools.config
    Support for encrypted properties.
  • Classes in io.j4c.config.spi used by io.j4c.config 
    Class Description
    AbstractConfigSource.Builder
    A common ConfigSource builder ready to be extended by builder implementation related to ConfigSource extensions.
    AbstractOverrideSource.Builder
    A common OverrideSource builder ready to be extended by builder implementation related to OverrideSource extensions.
    AbstractParsableConfigSource.Builder
    Common AbstractParsableConfigSource Builder ready to be extended by Builder implementation related to AbstractParsableConfigSource extensions.
    ConfigFilter
    Filter SPI that allows to filter configuration elementary (String) values before it will accessible via Config API.
    ConfigMapperProvider
    ConfigMapper Provider SPI that allows to register custom ConfigMapper implementations to map a configuration hierarchy to a Java type.
    ConfigNode.ObjectNode
    Represents a configuration node in a hierarchical configuration tree-like structure created from the data loaded by a given ConfigSource and subsequently parsed by a suitable ConfigParser if necessary.
    ConfigParser
    ConfigParser SPI that allows to provide a custom configuration format parser.
    ConfigSource
    ConfigSource SPI that allows to implement custom mechanism to load configuration raw data from any source.
    OverrideSource
    OverrideSource SPI allows overriding of existing values.
    PollingStrategy
    Polling Strategy SPI allows user to implement own policy for polling ConfigSource(s) to load changed config data.
    RetryPolicy
    A execute policy allows user implementing his own policy to executing and re-executing a call of supplying method.
  • Classes in io.j4c.config.spi used by io.j4c.config.etcd 
    Class Description
    AbstractConfigSource.Builder
    A common ConfigSource builder ready to be extended by builder implementation related to ConfigSource extensions.
    AbstractParsableConfigSource.Builder
    Common AbstractParsableConfigSource Builder ready to be extended by Builder implementation related to AbstractParsableConfigSource extensions.
    AbstractSource.Builder
    A common AbstractSource builder ready to be extended by builder implementation related to AbstractSource extensions.
    ConfigSource
    ConfigSource SPI that allows to implement custom mechanism to load configuration raw data from any source.
    PollingStrategy
    Polling Strategy SPI allows user to implement own policy for polling ConfigSource(s) to load changed config data.
    PollingStrategy.PollingEvent
    An event is fired by PollingStrategy to every subscriber listening on polling strategy publisher.
  • Classes in io.j4c.config.spi used by io.j4c.config.git 
    Class Description
    AbstractConfigSource.Builder
    A common ConfigSource builder ready to be extended by builder implementation related to ConfigSource extensions.

    Common AbstractParsableConfigSource Builder ready to be extended by Builder implementation related to AbstractParsableConfigSource extensions.

    ConfigSource SPI that allows to implement custom mechanism to load configuration raw data from any source.
  • Classes in io.j4c.config.spi used by io.j4c.config.hocon 
    Class Description
    ConfigParser
    ConfigParser SPI that allows to provide a custom configuration format parser.
  • Classes in io.j4c.config.spi used by io.j4c.config.spi 
    Class Description
    AbstractConfigSource
    A base abstract implementation of ConfigSource ready to be extended by any config source implementation that provides a common implementation of Config Source SPI.
    AbstractConfigSource.Builder
    A common ConfigSource builder ready to be extended by builder implementation related to ConfigSource extensions.
    AbstractOverrideSource.Builder
    A common OverrideSource builder ready to be extended by builder implementation related to OverrideSource extensions.
    AbstractParsableConfigSource.Builder
    Common AbstractParsableConfigSource Builder ready to be extended by Builder implementation related to AbstractParsableConfigSource extensions.
    AbstractSource
    An abstract source class is base class for all kinds of sources.
    AbstractSource.Builder
    A common AbstractSource builder ready to be extended by builder implementation related to AbstractSource extensions.
    AbstractSource.Data
    Data loaded at appropriate time.
    Changeable
    Interface used to mark changeable source.
    ConfigContext
    Context created by Config.Builder during Config bootstrap to be used by SPI implementations.
    ConfigNode
    Any config value marker interface.
    ConfigNode.ListNode
    ConfigNode-based list of configuration values.
    ConfigNode.ListNode.Builder
    Builder to build ConfigNode.ListNode instance.
    ConfigNode.NodeType
    Base types of config nodes.
    ConfigNode.ObjectNode
    Represents a configuration node in a hierarchical configuration tree-like structure created from the data loaded by a given ConfigSource and subsequently parsed by a suitable ConfigParser if necessary.
    ConfigNode.ObjectNode.Builder
    Builder to build ConfigNode.ObjectNode instance.
    ConfigNode.ValueNode
    Supplier of a single String-based configuration value.
    ConfigParser
    ConfigParser SPI that allows to provide a custom configuration format parser.
    ConfigParser.Content
    ConfigSource configuration Content to be parsed into hierarchical configuration representation.
    ConfigParserException
    Root class for exception throwing when something goes wrong with Config Parser SPI.
    ConfigSource
    ConfigSource SPI that allows to implement custom mechanism to load configuration raw data from any source.
    OverrideSource
    OverrideSource SPI allows overriding of existing values.
    OverrideSource.OverrideData
    A wrapper class for override data type.
    PollingStrategy
    Polling Strategy SPI allows user to implement own policy for polling ConfigSource(s) to load changed config data.
    PollingStrategy.PollingEvent
    An event is fired by PollingStrategy to every subscriber listening on polling strategy publisher.
    RetryPolicy
    A execute policy allows user implementing his own policy to executing and re-executing a call of supplying method.
    Source
    Source SPI that allows to implement custom mechanism to load raw data from any source.
  • Classes in io.j4c.config.spi used by io.j4c.config.yaml 
    Class Description
    ConfigParser
    ConfigParser SPI that allows to provide a custom configuration format parser.
  • Classes in io.j4c.config.spi used by io.j4c.security.tools.config 
    Class Description
    ConfigFilter
    Filter SPI that allows to filter configuration elementary (String) values before it will accessible via Config API.
